head.b:skin: /* <Variable hideEditor="true" name="body.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal 400 14px 'Google Sans Text', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif" value="normal 400 14px Arial, sans-serif"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="body.background" description="Body Background" type="background" color="#ffffff" default="#ffffff none repeat scroll top left" value="#ffffff none repeat scroll top left"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="body.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="$(defaultColorText)" value="#9aa0a6"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="body.text.font" description="1" type="font" default="$(body.font)" value="normal 400 14px 'Google Sans Text', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="posts.background.color" description="2" type="color" default="transparent" value="transparent"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="body.link.color" description="3" type="color" default="$(defaultColorKey)" value="#1a73e8"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="tabs.font" description="9" type="font" default="$(body.text.font)" value="normal 400 14px 'Google Sans Text', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="tabs.color" description="10" type="color" default="#e5e5e5" value="#e5e5e5"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="tabs.selected.color" description="11" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="tabs.overflow.background.color" description="12" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="tabs.overflow.color" description="13" type="color" default="$(defaultColorText)" value="#212121"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="tabs.overflow.selected.color" description="14" type="color" default="$(defaultColorText)" value="#212121"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="posts.title.color" description="15" type="color" default="$(defaultColorText)" value="#212121"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="posts.title.font" description="16" type="font" default="$(body.text.font)" value="normal 400 14px 'Google Sans Text', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="posts.text.font" description="17" type="font" default="$(body.text.font)" value="normal 400 14px 'Google Sans Text', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="posts.text.color" description="18" type="color" default="$(defaultColorText)" value="#212121"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="posts.icons.color" description="19" type="color" default="$(defaultColorText)" value="#212121"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="labels.background.color" description="20" type="color" default="$(defaultColorKey)" value="#1a73e8"/> */ [elc:include ./build/styles/normalize.css]

b:if.cond: false and data:blog.pageType in {"static_page", "item"} and data:blog.isMobileRequest
